ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Other zoning bugs
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Last night on Karana, a bunch of Verant folks (led by I assume DeSani) were running around as tadpoles attacking people for 1 point of damage.  They had a
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 13 Apr 2000, Reeves, Patrick W wrote:
>
> Personally I have had great relations with GMs/Guides. The only one I ever
> had trouble with was GM-Jagar. I sure wish GM-Mennix would come back to
> Karana though :( Our current GM (DeSani) is kind of a nut though. He keeps
> showing at after we kill big targets. On out last Inny kill he paid us a
> visit as first Inny, then Draco, then we turned into a 6 inch tall human
> lol.

Last night on Karana, a bunch of Verant folks (led by I assume
DeSani) were running around as tadpoles attacking people for 1
point of damage. They had a ton of hp, and when some necro
managed to kill one of them, they brought out a huge tadpole
called the froglok avenger, double-attacking for 100+,
backstabbing for 400+. I have a ton of screenshots.

But yeah, DeSani is a nut. :) Was a lot of fun to watch,
although a couple people were killed because they had some
flags that caused all nearby NPCs to attack anyone who attcked
them.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
